00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'dansguardian.php');
00041 
00042 class Blacklists extends Dansguardian
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'blacklists';
00045     
00046     public $LogFile= '/var/tmp/comixwall/search.out';
00047     
00048     private $blacklistsPath= '';
00049 
00050     function Blacklists()
00051     {
00052         parent::Model();
00053         
00054         $this->blacklistsPath= $this->confDir.'lists/blacklists/';
00055         
00056         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00057             $this->Commands,
00058             array(
00059                 'SearchSite'=>  array(
00060                     'argv'  =>  array(REGEXP),
00061                     'desc'  =>  _('Search site'),
00062                     ),
00063                 )
00064             );
00065     }
00066 
00074     function SearchSite($site)
00075     {
00076         $dir= dirname($this->LogFile);
00077         if (!file_exists($dir)) {
00078             exec('/bin/mkdir -p '.$dir);
00079         }
00080 
00081         // Do not list results from domain/url.processed files,
00082         // *.processed files are generated by dansguardian
00083         $site= escapeshellarg($site);
00084         $cmd= "/usr/bin/find $this->blacklistsPath \! -name \"*.processed\" -exec /usr/bin/grep -Io -E $site {} \; > $this->LogFile 2>&1";
00085         exec($cmd, $output, $retval);
00086 
00087         return $retval <= 1 ? $this->LogFile : FALSE;
00088     }
00089 
00097     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00098     {
00099         $re= "|^$this->blacklistsPath(\S+)/(\S+):(.*)$|";
00100         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00101             $cols['Category']= ucwords($match[1].' '.$match[2]);
00102             $cols['Site']= $match[3];
00103             return TRUE;
00104         }
00105         return FALSE;
00106     }
00107 }
00108 ?>
